author.persName: Mir Radi al-Din Artimani. (So in colophon)

msItem.title: Divan of Mir Radi al-Din.
msItem.note: F1a: Meer Ruzzy's odes Time of Shah Abbas Final folio, verso: a) Note of possession of Mir Isma'il. b) Note of purchase from Mir Isma'il Sahib for one rupee ... dated 17 Rajab 1178 (10 January 1765). Additional folios before and after the original text have verses, some attributed to 'Abdi, Hassan Rida and Sayyid Mubarak Khan, a recipe for a relish etc. Limp marbled card cover. Ruled marrgins and dividing panels. Illuminated initial opening. Some pages in the early part sprinkled with colour.
msItem.incipit: Chun muhr? barayi bam u iwan-ra

listBibl.bibl: For Price's bequest see J.R.A.S. 1834 154, vi, lxxvi-ii. (Reference from Robinson. Last two pages not in the Library copy) and 1836, pp. xii-xiv (an obituary note p. lx).

layoutDesc.p: 12lines to the page in double column

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
